The elemental makes two slam attacks.
Melee Weapon Attack:
 +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 
Hit:
 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb
the material it moves through.
The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

name: Earth Elemental
senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10
